name: Mahjong Solitaire: Match Tiles
description:
Mahjong Solitaire is a free mahjong tiles matching game - the best choice of Mahjong Puzzle riddle game.

MAHJONG SOLIRAIRE QUEST GAME FEATURES

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
LEARN MORE ABOUT FREE MAHJONG SOLITARIE GAME
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* Mahjong solitaire become one of the most popular free board game all over the world. This free board mahjong matching game is also known as Mah-Jong, Majong and Top Mahjong.
* Mahjong tiles game is well known as Taipei Mahjong and Shanghai Mahjong
* The innovative new version of classic Mahjong Solitaire with simple rules and addictive gameplay: Match pairs of identical mahjong tiles (connect the same mahjong block), clear all the mahjong, WIN! Make a blast in Classic Mahjong Solitaire tile matching game!
* Mahjong classic solitary quest game has no time limit. Just take your time and enjoy your mahjong quests journey and blast it all! Mahjong challenges await you in this magical mahjong solitaire journey game.
